module:
Module-level comment: 
This is the 'xadc_wiz_0' module designed for interfacing with an XADC (Xilinx Analog-to-Digital Converter) wizard device. It handles ADC management including data flow, synchronization, and signal conversion. Inputs include 7-bit digital address, clock, enable, 16-bit data, write enable and analog voltage signals with both positive and negative ADC inputs. Outputs include busy signal, 5-bit channel indicator, 16-bit digital data, digital ready, end-of-conversion, end-of-sequence, and alarm signals. Detailed internal implementation is not provided in this module description.
